{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$3.7M in 2021-2022** on contracts with TOURE CLEANING SERVICES.

Across 36 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 13 have at least one amendment (36%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 320% and the average number of amendments was 2.23. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$2.2M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.37 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$424.2K. The longest contract was 6.09 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$8.1M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
